channel.description: The latest CVEs for SliceWP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47388|2024-10-05T14:48:23.991Z -- slicewp -- slicewp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SliceWP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SliceWP: from n/a through 1.1.18.

item.title: CVE-2024-34413|2024-06-04T17:41:23.362Z -- slicewp -- slicewp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SliceWP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SliceWP: from n/a through 1.1.10.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SliceWP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SliceWP: from n/a through 1.1.10.
